728982f-a.title: Richmond: Hylan Boulevard - Fairlawn Avenue
728982f-a.text:
3662 Hylan Boulevard, south side, between Fairlawn Avenue
and Lydia Lane. The maps from 1898 to 1917 show it to be the
David Wesson house. P. L. Sperr states that it is the Elliott
house. The dwelling is 500 feet back of the boulevard.
May 14, 1932.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
